title: (Rant) Account smurfing, buddy boosting and account sharing is brutal
body:
i know it happens, its common but this weekend it has been quite high.
not only do you stomp to win but you have to taunt and humiliate the opponents your crushing

its just weak.

I don't get it, you feel stressed out about life and your elo so you decide to go into a much lower elo to stomp and feel good about yourself?  you may feel good, but its brutal for those in that elo, and the stress you feel, is being passed onto others who dont deserve it!

and before you say, oh you can learn from it, TRUE! yes you can but upto a certain extent, when your getting crushed, you don't focus on the game as well. and overall isnt a positive learning experience.

don't pretend your doing that elo a favour by being there.

You maybe also helping out a "friend" get to where they "deserve" to be, but in the end your just destroying the ladder, and ruining other peoples enjoyment of this wonderful game.


PLEASE STOP IT!

replies.body:
'
here is the missing apostrophe, I'm sure you know what to do with it.

As someone who frequently smurfs, I can tell you almost everyone who says they're smurfing isn't. When you smurf you don't tell people, all it does is provoke people to troll and afk just so it annoys the person smurfing. If anyone tell's you they're smurfing or acts like a dickhead over all chat or normal chat, they're usually just little children who need to be spanked. On the off chance they are smurfing and are completely insecure about how big their dick is, realise that they're a sad bastard who spends too much of their time worrying about what other people think of them (especially on a game where no one knows who you are) and only say shit because if they did that IRL they would get knocked out by someone soon enough.

going full BM or not doing anything at all, its still an awful experience.

i'd get it if it was used to learn new champions and they sucked quite badly, i'd get that. but smurfs arent used like that at all.

the 3 top reasons for smurfs arent for self development or fun with friends (if it was you would play blind pick, customs or teambuilder)


1. to boost your mate
2. to relieve your stress (while transplanting it onto others)
3. to troll and play whatever you like.

its hard enough to climb if your legitimately at that elo
this needs to stop.

**its cruel.**

Eh it's human nature to want to feel superior to other people, if someone has to smurf to get a feeling of superiority I feel bad for them, that being said it's technically legal and short of linking peoples real life identities to their online game accounts (which is stupid and wouldn't happen in a million years) there will always be smurfs in any online multiplayer games, it's just the way it is. So that leaves you with the options of either not playing LoL anymore or just dealing with it, these are the only options no ones word would ever stop smurfing nor would Riot ever do anything about smurfing.

80% of my elo is boosted shtlords and kids who lucked out in placements so instead of getting salty about losing games because of bronze level kids in diamond ill go ahead and drop 20 bombs in gold elo :)
A Vayne got a Quadra, and a Penta in one game a few days ago in Norms. Not sure if the player was even ranked. :(
